sell.priceComputing: Enter how many "{{exchangeBuyerTokenSymbol}}" token(s)you want to receive in exchange of 1 "{{exchangeOfferTokenSymbol}}" token.
sell.exchangeAmount: Quantity of selled tokens to exchange
sell.placeholderPrice: Number of purchase tokens for one token on sale
sell.checkboxLabelPrivateOffre: I want to create a private offer
sell.invalidPrivateOfferAddress: Unable to create an offer for your address
sell.zeroBalanceError: You cannot create this offer because you don't have "{{tokenSymbol}}" token
sell.shieldError: Price difference is {{priceDifference}}% but limit fixed by shield is +/-{{maxPriceDifference}}%. ("shield" setting on top right corner, for more informations)
sell.officialPriceInfos: The official property has been selled for {{officialPrice}} ${{officialSellCurrency}}. But you are free to choose the price.
sell.txSellSummary: You wish to sell up to {{amount}} "{{offerTokenSymbol}}" with a unit price of {{price}} "{{buyTokenSymbol}}" and for a total of {{total}} "{{buyTokenSymbol}}".
sell.txBuySummary: You wish to buy up to {{amount}} "{{buyTokenSymbol}}" with a unit price of {{price}} "{{offerTokenSymbol}}" and for a total of {{total}} "{{offerTokenSymbol}}".
sell.txExchangeSummary: You wish to exchange up to {{amount}} "{{buyTokenSymbol}}" with a unit price of {{price}} "{{offerTokenSymbol}}" and for a total of {{total}} "{{offerTokenSymbol}}".

buy.title: Buy Offer
buy.buyOfferTypePrice: Price/token (Nb of buy token by RealT token)
buy.sellOfferTypePrice: Price/token (Nb of RealT token by sell token)
buy.exchangeOfferTypePrice: Price/token (Nb of buy token by sell token)

permit.details: A permit is a transaction that allows you to buy without having to approve the contract. This is consume less fees but you need you to sign a message in your wallet.

approve.details: The buy will be made with two transactions: the first one will approve the contract, then the second you will execute the buy.

update.title: Update Offer
update.summaryText1: You will modify the price from

chooseOfferType.title: Which type of offer do you want to create ?
chooseOfferType.buyTypeExplain: Choose "{{ offerType }}" offer's type when you want to buy a RealT property token with other non Realt tokens (WXDAI, WETH, USDC etc...)
chooseOfferType.sellTypeExplain: Choose "{{ offerType }}" offer's type when you want to sell a RealT property token against other non Realt tokens (WXDAI, WETH, USDC etc...)
chooseOfferType.exchangeTypeExplain: Choose "{{ offerType }}" offer's type when you want to exchange a RealT property token against other tokens (WXDAI, WETH, USDC etc...) or against another RealT property token, or two non RealT token between them.
